            SUBSTANCES PHASE-OUT PROJECT,TF032632-BULGARIA - OZONE DEPLETION
            SUBSTANCE PHASE-OUT PROJECT,TF032151-BULGARIA - ENVIRONMENT (OZONE

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Ozone Depleting
            Substances Phase-out Project is to assist Bulgaria's
            transition into non-CFC technology as required under the
            Montreal Protocol. The project will help Bulgaria reach its
            objective by: 1) supporting prioirity sub-projects,
            identified in the Country Program, for technology conversion
            to non-CFC materials; 2) initiating CFC recovery,
            reclamation, and recycling operation; and 3) strengthening
            the institutional capacity of the Ozone Task Force (OTF) to
            implement the Country Program. The project consists of
            technology conversion in 12 sub-projects in seven
            enterprises and a technical assistance and training
            component involving 4 sub-projects in the Institute of
            Refrigeration and the Ministry of Environment.
